headline: PPG to announce fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 results Jan. 30
summary: PITTSBURGH, January 07, 2025--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced the following details for its fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 earnings release and teleconference call.
